The .338 Lapua Magnum is a specialised rimless bottlenecked centrefire cartridge developed for military long-range sniper rifles. The Afghanistan War and Iraq War made it a combat-proven round with ready and substantial ammunition availability. The .338 Lapua is a dual-purpose anti-personnel and anti-materiel round, but its anti-materiel potential is limited.

The .50 Browning Machine Gun (12.7?99mm NATO and designated as the 50 Browning by the C.I.P.) is a cartridge developed for the Browning .50 caliber machine gun in the late 1910s, entering official service in 1921. Under STANAG 4383, it is a standard cartridge for NATO forces as well as many non-NATO countries. The cartridge itself has been made in many variants: multiple generations of regular ball, tracer, armor-piercing (AP), incendiary, and saboted sub-caliber rounds. The rounds intended for machine guns are made into a continuous belt using metallic links. 
		
The .50 BMG cartridge is also used in long-range target and anti-materiel rifles, as well as other .50-caliber machine guns.

The 7.62x25mm cartridge is a Russian bottle-necked pistol cartridge widely used in former Soviet satellite states, China and Pakistan among other countries. The cartridge is an enhanced Russian version of the 7.63x25mm Mauser. It has an excellent penetration and can easily defeat lighter ballistic vests as well as kevlar helmets. Although most firearms chambered in this calibre are obsolete and removed from military inventories, the cartridge still sees widespread use because of the large quantity of stored ammunition available.

7.62x39 M43 is an armour piercing round produced in China, which is why it's often referred to as "7.62x39 CN". This round features a mild steel core which enhances its penetration capabilities. This Chinese round (as well as all other M43 ammunition) is currently banned for import in the US because US federal law classifies the round as an armour-piercing handgun round. This classification is based on materials and bullet design rather than on empirical ability to penetrate armour.

One of the most mysterious artefacts in the Zone, the Eye of the Noosphere can transport its wielder back in time, even to escape death. A tight squeeze of the artefact activates its ability, creating a restoration point to go back to on activation or death. Frequent use can cause the artefact to change colour, but if discharged too frequently it may cease to function altogether. The Eye gradually restores its power over time, supposedly being fuelled by the anomalous energy of the Zone.
 

		%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

		%c[ui_white] � %c[0,255,215,0] superartefact

A formation of thermal nature. The Itcher consists of two separated layers. The surface is a hard, dense metamorphic rock with deep scars covering the entire body. Completely inactive and doesn't hold any noticeable properties. On the other hand, the soft, yellow glowing core is from unknown organic nature. It actively consumes excessive heat and remains cool at all times.
		\nHowever, it is not recommended to approach chemical and acid anomalies when in possession of the artefact as it will increase the adverse effects of acids and toxins in user's bloodstream.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

A small artefact formed by thermal anomalies in the Zone under extreme temperatures. The look of this artefact suggests that it was an organ of a vascular plant. Further studies showed that other organic tissues are fused deep inside.
		\nThe stem doesn't hold any useful properties. On the contrary, the small pins reduce temperature of user's body and cool all objects in their vicinity.
		\nThis artefact offers a slight psy-protection as it will resonate under the influence of psy-waves. On the other hand, it is not recommended to approach chemical and acid anomalies when in possession of the artefact as it will increase the adverse effects of acids and toxins in user's bloodstream.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact is formed in anomalous zones with intense thermal activity. Actively consumes excessive heat and remains cool at all times.
		\nIt will also protect the user against electrical currents. On the other hand, exposure to such environments makes the artefact increase the conductivity due to unknown as of now mechanism. For this reason, one is forced to weigh pros and cons of Crystal when in the vicinity of areas of high conductivity.
		\nThis artefact is also highly sought for by jewellers outside the Zone as its inner core is not radioactive and considered to be of exceptional beauty if polished and refined. Only the first 1 cm of its outer layer emits radiation.
		\nIt is, however, highly advised to proceed with caution when planning to bring the artefact to the market as prolonged exposure to even minimal amounts of radioactive materials can result in death of the user. Covered with very hard layer. Relatively heavy due to high density.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

It is a spherical artefact made of red-coloured crystal, created in the Burner anomaly.
		\nIt has an unique property: it has a constant temperature of 75 degrees Fahrenheit/24 degrees Celsius, regardless of its surroundings. This allows it to absorb heat from its vicinity and to create a little pocket around the user which prevents the flames from damaging the body.
		\nA dangerous effect of this artefact is the fact that it will increase electrical conductivity, so the probability of electrocution while wearing this artefact is much higher, especially during storms and in the vicinity of electrical anomalies.It is quite heavy due to high density of crystal-like material.
		\n \nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

A reddish formation of compressed fossilised plants, soil and animal debris. Can partially neutralise chemical poisons by absorbing them and reducing overall toxicity level in user's bloodstream. Quite widespread and not very effective as it makes chemical burns fester. It will catch fire when exposed to open flame or even spontaneously combust. 
		\nAnother positive effect possessed by this artefact is that it accelerates clotting if worn close to the body. Although it is not recommended to keep this artefact in your possession for longer periods of time as blood clots can be hazardous to your health.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact has soft, porous, skin-like texture and is said to be able to compress. It resembles and acts like a sponge in this regard, but reveals its special characteristics only when exposed to certain external conditions.
		\nFirstly, to carry the sponge metaphor further, the pores on its surface are known to absorb small amounts of toxicity from environment.
		\nSecondly, the artefact slightly amplifies the damaging effects of psy-fields to living organisms by absorbing psy energy and emitting it at a small rate.
		\nThirdly, Meat Chunk is also known to be a conductor of electricity much like the skin of a living creature.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Bracelet is formed from common species of bryophytes plants under high exposure to radioactive and chemical anomalies, which explains its organic nature.
		\nIt provides substantial protection against all types of acids by gradually increasing their pH to the level of water (pH of 7).
		\nWhen worn, the artefact is also known to slightly counter the harmful effects of psy-anomalies or psy-waves of some mutants.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

A compound of several hollow organic formations, this artefact emits a gaseous substance that can neutralise chemical or toxic particles inside the body without harming it. Thus providing a a great level of toxic and chemical protection.
		\nIt also has a constant temperature regardless of its surroundings. This allows it to absorb heat from its vicinity and to create a little pocket around the user which prevents the flames from damaging the body. 
		\nApart from that Bubble, however, possesses numerous negative properties. For example, it greatly amplifies the effects of psy-waves as well as fields produced by mutants and anomalies. This disadvantage is not to be taken lightly: some stalkers have reported that psy influence was so potent when in possession of a Bubble that they felt their heads cracking from the inside and the only thing they could do was scream in pain and run as far as they could. 
		\n \nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact has the appearance of translucent spider webs. Just as proteinaceous spider silk, it is sticky and has properties of glue.
		\nIt can be found most commonly in or near electro anomalies and it seems to have absorbed their certain characteristics: it is able to smooth fluctuations in electric field density and acts as a weak resistor, protecting the wearer from electricity and reducing its damaging effects.
		\nOn the other hand, it should be noted that the presence of this artefact increases the corrosiveness of acids, leading to accelerated deterioration of equipment and higher damage to tissues of any living organism.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

Sponge has always been under debate among the Ecologists. Some suggest that this artefact is driven from basic form of organisms, while others believe its an advanced life form with self-awareness inherited from living creatures.
		\nDespite the theories surrounding the artefact, all can agree on one thing: it moves. The sponge sometimes tries to "grab" an object it touches. Putting it in a container might be a hard task, as if it wants to escape.
		\nThis artefact acts as a powerful resistor and will absorb even lethal doses of electricity. On the other hand, it will catch fire when exposed to open flame or even spontaneously combust.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

A very small artefact of electric nature. Difficult to spot. Consists of two ring-shaped materials of organic nature, hence the given name.
		When the Ring spins, it never stops spinning, defying the first law of thermodynamics. Scientists suggest that this artefact inherits gravitational properties from Vortex anomalies.
		\nThe outer ring has a high-conductivity. It absorbs electrical current from relative sources then ground it in the inner ring. Despite the basic function, the mechanism behind the disappearance of electrical power inside the second ring is still unknown.
		\nOn the other side, the Ring is flammable. Prolonged exposure may enhance its flammability and cause it to ignite.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact is very similar in appearance to Moonlight and resembles a plasma globe or a plasma lamp.
		\nBeing a powerful resistor, it is well known for its ability to shield its user from lethal doses of electricity.
		\nWhen worn, it is known to slightly counter harmful effects of psy-anomalies or psy-waves of certain mutants. Flash acts as a powerful resistor and will absorb even lethal doses of electricity.
		\nHowever, it also hinders healing process, thus caution is advised especially when wounded or bleeding. This artefact is also extremely light and very portable.
		\n \nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact resembles melted cheese interspersed with sapphire-like stones. Only yellow outer shell of the artefact appears to give off radiation and by careful processing it is possible to extract the non-radioactive blue parts for jewellery and other industrial purposes. This is due to the fact that if cleaned properly and polished, sapphire comparison becomes much more explicit: the stones are as hard and durable as this beautiful gem. This quality of theirs and their appearance make them perfect gemstones and jewellers all over the world strive to have them in stock. 
		\nThe usefulness of the artefact, however, is not limited to its industrial applications. There is scientific evidence suggesting that sapphire-like stones effectively protect from psy-waves, whereas the outer shell slightly increases resistance to toxicity.
		\nHowever, it can cause objects in its vicinity to heat up and in extreme cases to ignite along with the artefact. For this reason, it is safe to conclude that it absorbs heat and is able to convey it to other objects.
		\nDue to its density the weight of artefact has increased beyond normal standards, and thus it is one of the heaviest anomalous creations in the Zone.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

As the name suggests, this artefact has the shape of two eggs fused together. The outer surface is very thick, the high density of its formation might be the reason behind its deep colour.
		\nThis artefact offers slightly more psy-protection than its cousin, Stone Flower. It resonates under the influence of psy-waves to some degree and absorbs the dangerous effect.
		\nAnother positive property is the ability to consume excessive heat while remaining cool at all times.
		\nDue to its density of the surface, the Lobster Eyes is quite heavy.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

This unique electrostatic artefact can resonate under the influence of psy-waves. Stalkers have learned to fine-tune the artefact so that it resonates in opposite phase to the main source of emissions, thus significantly neutralizing their effects. This orb of considerable beauty also increases electrical protection by reducing conductivity in the body when exposed to high levels of electricity.
		\nIt should be noted that Moonlight will catch fire when exposed to open flame or even spontaneously combust. 
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Being a rare artefact, little is known about its properties and origins. 
		\nBlack Spray shares a similar shape to other sapphire-like artefacts. However, the organic nature of the stem (which shares similar properties to Pin artefacts) suggests that its formed from vascular plants under exposure to dangerous psy-fields and electromagnetic waves.
		\nAnother unique property is the ability to delay the transmission of light that enters it. The said mysterious mechanism is applied to psy-waves surrounding the artefact as well. For this particular reason, Black Spray significantly neutralises psy interferences in a large radius.
		\nThese beneficial properties, however, come at a price. This artefact is extremely dangerous when exposed in toxic environments as it amplifies their effect and increases their potency. When exploring toxic areas, it is hence highly recommended to keep the artefact in your backpack.
		\nDue to the beautiful blue aura it emits, it is highly sought after by jewellers all over the world.
		\n \nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

Very common in the Zone. This gravitational artefact is able to slightly shield the body and objects from physical impacts.
		\nIt will slightly protect its user against extreme heat produced respectively by fire anomalies.
		\nThis artefact is quite heavy as the gravitational field seems to increase mass. Another downside to this artefact is that it will increase the negative effects of psy-waves and is a potent conductor.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

This bizarrely-shaped artefact appears in places with increased gravitational activity.
		\nAlthough it appears almost organic, it is actually more similar to coral. Due to its gravitational nature, It provides protection against physical impacts as it greatly reduces the friction caused by fast objects.
		\nActing as a kind of sponge that absorbs chemical and toxic elements as well, this artefact provides protection from external toxic agents as well as from chemical particles that have already made their way into the body.
		\nWrenced can generate a locally directed gravity field which increases its mass. For this reason, this artefact is heavy.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Two disks of organic formation (commonly lipids, cellulose and lignin) with nothing but empty space in between. This is due to a unique gravitation field formed in the centre that stabilise the distance between the disks.
		\nAny attempt to press the disks together, or pull them apart will fail due to rapid positive/negative changes in the gravitational field. As if the artefact reacts to any physical power that breaks its balance.
		\nBecause of this mechanism, moving with an Empty is a hard task. As the gravitational field increases the density of surrounding air and slows the body down.
		\nThe real usefulness of this effect comes to the ability to reduce friction, thus obtaining great protection against physical impacts.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Similar to Empty, this artefact consist of two disks of organic formation connected by a unique gravitational field in between. However, the said field in Full Empty is extraordinary: all atoms entering the centre, regardless of their nature, become interactive under the unknown effects of the field. Thus releasing photons (light emitting).
		\nScientists usually refer to it as the "galaxy effect", which gives the artefact an exceptional orbit of light.
		\nThe density increment of surrounding air caused by moving is higher comparing to Empty. Because of this, the artefact will greatly hinder its holder's movement.
		\nBeing superior artefact to Empty, the protection against physical impacts is remarkable. Some claims that Full Empty is capable of stopping 9mm bullets fired at point blank.
		\n \nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

This glowing artefact can generate a local directed low-gravity field. Widely used by stalkers along with Gravi, a similar artefact, to increase maximum load.
		\nDue to its beautiful inner core it is highly sought after by jewellers all over the world, however it is best to proceed with caution as unskilled treatment can cause the artefact to explode with power sufficient to level a small building. It is thus highly advised to perform the polishing by means of specialised machinery, which minimises the probability of explosion. Moreover, only the outer core of the artefact emits radiation.
		\nNightstar will also absorb toxic and chemical agents from the environment, which makes it a valuable artefact for artefact hunters, although the amount of toxicity absorbed is negligible. It is, however, relatively cheap and even stalkers with pretty tight budgets can afford it if opportunity to buy it arises. 
		\nThat being said, Nightstar emits odour of burning flesh when in the closest proximity of heat source. Prolonged exposure may enhance its flammability and cause it to ignite.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

Gravi is formed from metallic substances exposed to prolonged gravitation. This makes it capable of sustaining an powerful anti-gravitational field, which causes it to have various properties, among others reducing weight of all objects in its close proximity. For a long time, the artefact was a mystery, and it was scientist Sakharov at Yantar who first discovered that Gravi creates a minute singularity field of anti-gravitational nature, the phenomenon which occurs in intervals of 30 minutes.
		\nA dangerous effect of this artefact is the fact that it will increase electrical conductivity, so the probability of electrocution while wearing this artefact is much higher, especially during storms and in the vicinity of electrical anomalies.
		\nAnother downside is that it will increase the negative effects of psy-waves and is a potent conductor.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Direct successor to and a superior version of Gravi artefact. As was the case with Gravi, it was scientist Sakharov at Yantar who discovered its unique properties after a massive blowout/emission hit the Zone.
		\nThanks to meticulous research that followed, it was established that this new artefact is produced when three Gravi artefacts interact and get sucked into one another's singularity fields. This phenomenon is extremely rare, due to which the artefact is highly valued.
		\nIt is rumoured within Ukrainian Spetsnaz circles that in the Zone there are agents from the Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation whose sole objective is acquiring and transporting Goldfish to specialised laboratories located outside of the Zone.
		\nThe artefact creates a constant anti-gravitational singularity field which affects only its closest vicinity. However, some stalkers have been known to disappear for no apparent reason leaving only a Goldfish behind.
		\nBig downside, however, comes along with this powerful anti-gravitational field: the velocity of moving objects inside its radius will rapidly increase, causing dangerous impacts on surrounding objects, including the holder.
		\n \nRadiation output is highest on the artefact radiation scale.

Shaped like a DNA helix, Mama's Beads are created in the Burner anomaly. One of their most characteristic features is that they constantly pulsate, generating emissions beneficial to the human body. These emissions increase the metabolism of any living creature, accelerating coagulation and healing of wounds.The mechanism behind the effects of this artefact is still unknown.
		\nMama's Beads also possess potent protective qualities: they are able to shield the body and objects from extreme heat.
		\nOn the other hand, it should be noted that the presence of this artefact increases electrical conductivity, so the probability of electrocution while wearing this artefact is much higher, especially during storms and in the vicinity of electrical anomalies.
		\nThe weight is also quite high for such a small artefact, which leads to a conclusion that is of high density.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact, which resembles the human eye, considerably increases metabolism of the body, helping wounds heal quicker. Experienced stalkers say that Eye also brings luck. Irrespective of the validity of that statement, its positive effects are indeed quite potent. 
		\nThis artefact soothes the pain and is extremely useful when treating wounds.
		\nWhen worn, it is known to slightly counter harmful effects of psy-anomalies or psy-waves of certain mutants.
		\nThese beneficial qualities, however, come at a price. This artefact is extremely dangerous when exposed to chemical anomalies as it amplifies their toxicity and increases their potency. It is hence highly recommended to keep the artefact in your backpack, never on the body, when exploring toxic areas unless you have a death wish.
		\nThe artefact is also known colloquially as "copper eye" as it conducts electricity and amplifies its dangerous effects in the same way as copper does. 
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact forms in areas of high thermal activity. Produces powerful infrared emissions which intensify metabolic processes, healing wounds before its bearer's very eyes.
		\nIts healing capabilities are even stronger than in case of the Eye as stalkers in possession of this artefact are said to have survived being wounded by chimeras. Thanks to that, it has earned the reputation of a miraculous artefact.
		\nMany stalkers owe it their lives, and most veteran mutant hunters carry it in case they run into danger. However, it shares not only positive but also negative properties of its cousin: entering a psy-field with this artefact on the belt is suicide. It will absorb psy energy and emitting it at a considerable rate.
		\nAlso, it is highly advised to proceed with caution when planning to bring the artefact to the market as prolonged exposure to even minimal amounts of radioactive materials can result in death of the user.
		\nIt can also be used as a reusable medkit of sorts since it heals wounds very quickly.
		\n \nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

\nThe artefact is quite popular in the Zone and is valued by its residents and visitors alike for its energizing properties, although it has an adverse effect on the body when used for prolonged periods of time.
		\nOne should take note, however, that this artefact hinders blood clotting and increases bleeding rate of open wounds. On the other hand, being a powerful resistor, it is well known for its ability to shield its user from lethal doses of electricity.
		\nBeing an artefact of electric nature, it is well known for its ability to shield its user from lethal doses of electricity. On the contrary, it should be noted that Battery absorbs heat and is able to convey it to other objects.
		\nThis artefact is also extremely light and very portable. 
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

Shell is composed of two disk of bluish colour connected by semitransparent material of unknown nature.
		\nThis strange artefact was considered devoid of any useful properties by many scientists for a long time. Only recently has it been discovered that it is indeed quite beneficial.
		\nWhen the artefact comes into contact with the body, it will make one feel rejuvenated and thus it increases stamina recovery. This effect has in case of some stalkers induced hyperactivity. One downside of this artefact, however, is that it reduces the number of platelets in blood, thus increasing bleeding rate.
		\nIt provides a considerable level of psy protection and absorbs electromagnetic interference, acting as a grounding material.
		\nIt will catch fire when exposed to open flame or even spontaneously combust. Caution must be taken when approaching heat sources with this artefact.
		\nShell is extremely light and very portable.
		\n \nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Also colloquially known as "Radioactive Snowflake". At first glance, this artefact resembles a white Kolobok.
		\nThanks to its unique properties, the artefact can significantly increase the bearer's muscle tone, thus greatly improving stamina recovery. Due to its high radioactivity, stalkers in possession of it are sometimes jokingly referred to as "Radioactive Snowflakes".
		\nWhen faced with the decision whether to carry it on the belt during a mission, you have to carefully weigh its pros and cons: does it pay to have greater endurance and high protection against electricity at the cost of being constantly exposed to its deadly radiation? Even if you are determined to take it with you, it should be noted that it is not to be used on long excursions to the Zone.
		\nSnowflake, however, holds a big downside: it interacts with surrounding energy sources by absorbing and amplifying their effects. For this reason, approaching heat sources, toxic areas and psy-fields while holding this artefact is a suicide.
		\nIt is as light as a snowflake and very easy to carry around.
		\n \nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

Soul is a unique organic artefact with properties just as unique: it secretes slimy goo that dramatically increases recovery rate of wounds. Thanks to its reasonable price and attractive appearance, this artefact is a valuable collector's item.
		\nApplying its gooey substance to wounds will soothes the pain and speeds up healing process. 
		\It also reduces the effects of psy-waves and their damage to one's brain. But it should be known that Soul drains power from its user. The artefact does not have high density and thus is not very heavy.
		\n \nRadiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

A relatively rare artefact forming in chemical areas, Kolobok is highly valued for its ability to heal most kinds of wounds and stop bleeding in a matter of minutes.
		\nFor unknown reasons, scientists are spreading rumours among stalkers that the artefact modifies bearer's genetic code, which is unproven and should be regarded as conscious attempt at monopolizing the supply of the artefact by the scientific community. This does not, however, mean that it is completely harmless.
		\nOne drawback of this artefact is the fact that it will interact to radioactive particles, so it is best to avoid radiation fields when in possession of the artefact, especially since its negative effects are not balanced with positive ones. It will also reduce energy recovery, which is the result of its sharp needle-like appendages. The needles cause small and quickly healing wounds which bring constant pain and itch, thus reducing stamina.
		\nThis artefact also weakens protection against heat and acids due to its high flammability. 
		\nLightweight and not too much of a burden to carry around.
		\nRadiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Firefly interacts with fields unknown to science, considerably speeding up regeneration of tissue and organs in living beings, as well as normalizing metabolic processes.
		\nThis artefact can literally get a badly wounded stalker back on his feet in a matter of minutes. On the other hand, Firefly can spontaneously combust when exposed to potent radioactive sources.
		\nA big downside to this artefact is that it weakens the body and reduce the number of platelets in blood during heal process, thus increasing bleeding rate.
		\nIt seems to drain stamina and decrease stamina recovery greatly as well. Some of those who used Firefly for its healing purposes have reported that they couldn't walk for hours afterwards.
		\nUnfortunately, Firefly is extremely rare.
		\nRadiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

A very rare artefact. It's been several years since one was found.
		\nIt can locate gaps in anomaly fields. It is believed that it can help one traverse the most complex anomaly fields completely unharmed. However, very few know how to handle it properly.
		\nThe Compass showed few unique properties under last experiments. It can interact to moving objects, causing some to completely disappear. Or perhaps teleport?
		\nIt also weakens the body by draining stamina and increasing bleeding rate constantly. But the biggest draw however, is the dangerous radiation output this artefact emits comparing to the artefact radiation scale.
		\nHolding this artefact near the body will cause death in matter of few minutes.

This artefact was found at the centre of the legendary Oasis. It appears that the Heart is a crystallised plant, which has acquired the healing properties of the Oasis.
		\nNot only it dramatically increases recovery rate of wounds and healing process, but also provides the body with strong source of energy. It is a true miracle.
		\nThat being said, the Oasis is very sensitive to outer sources of energy and surrounding environment. For this reason, interacting with anomaly fields will bring death to the holder.
		\n \nRadiation output is highest on the artefact radiation scale.

"Big, red and cursed."
		\nThis is how the locals prefer to describe the Death Lamp, while some refer to it as the "Seed of Satan". Many traders believe the rumours surrounding the artefact, thus refusing to buy it.
		Little is known about its origins, and nothing of value has been discovered so far.
		\nDeath Lamp was first discovered few years ago by a group of three experienced stalkers. Shortly after delivering the artefact to the Ecologists in Yantar, two of them found dead with a horrific expression on their faces. Nothing is known about the fate of the third stalker.
		\nFollowing the accident, members of the science team who studied the artefact had reported having nightmare disorder in the days to follow.
		\nApart from the mysterious effects, the artefact drains vitality and willpower from the user, often on such a scale that it induces dizziness and in extreme cases causes the user to faint. 
		\n \nRadiation output is highest on the artefact radiation scale.

The origins of artefacts such as this one are a mystery, as they are rarely found outside the northernmost parts of the Zone.
		\nThis unique artefact projects a non-contact field that inhibits nearbly anomalous phenomena. This grants the wearer a notable level of protection against most of the Zone's environmental hazards. It is also one of the few active artefacts that can be safely handled without lead containers.
		However, when you hold it your flesh feels dry and flaky, your bones hard and stiff, the ligaments in your joints squeaky and brittle. Thick armour or great supernatural vitality would be needed by anyone intending to wear this artefact into battle.
Truly, an amazing thing. The Black Stone protects against broadly considered adversity but instead is slowly killing the owner. Some stalkers suspect the artefact is a shard of the Monolith.

A piece of bread as dark as the soul of the person that left it.

Can I use your vice? I need to fix something up.
Alright... It's yours for a thousand roubles.
Great. I will have a rest for the moment. In the meantime, be quick. I've got more work to finish today.
After all you have done to help me? Of course! Still, try to be quick. I've got more work to finish today.
I have spare parts. Do you know who would buy them?
Technicians like me store all sorts of junk you can think of. I might buy what you've got. For the right price, of course.

Well, for functional parts I can give you 300 RU per new part. The worn ones for 150. About the rest of the junk, you get 250 for new parts, and 125 for worn out parts. Eh, 60 should be good for rusty parts. These are not that useful, you know.
Hmm... Well, your offer is so-so. But I have no actual use for these. Here, give me the money.
That's a bit cheap for me. Guess I'll think about it.
Nice doing business with you. If you get more spare parts, you know where to find me.
Uh, I'll keep that in mind. Thanks.

The repair procedure is affected by the overall quality of the weapon (new, worn, rusty) and its current condition. Moreover, the terms 0�65, 0�75 and 0�85 determine the weapon status for each of the quality types: 0�65% for rusty weapons, 0�75% for worn weapons and 0�85% for new weapons.
Repair and upgrade procedure (weapons with condition from 0�65/0�75/0�85):

1. Select a repair kit to replace the weapon barrel with another barrel of the same calibre with the weapon status from 0�20/0�25/0�30 or using a weapon upgrade kit in a condition from 20�65/25�75/30�85 by double clicking on the name of the set with the list.
2. Select a part in the list with a single mouse click. Replacing parts when repairing weapons with a low state occurs in a certain sequence:
 
At condition 0�20/0�25/0�30%: Replacement of barrel
At condition 20�35/25�45/30�55%: Replacement of trigger (shock�trigger mechanism)
At condition 35�45/45�60/55�70%: Replacement of breech head
At condition 45�55/60�70/70�80%: Replacement of gas tube
At condition 55�65/70�75/80�85%: Replacement of breech block
 
3. Click on the image of the part that is being currently replaced (the part selected for the replacement that is available for replacement is indicated by a green light). Attempting to replace one part spends one charge of a belt. set
4. In case the replacement is successful, this procedure is repeated for all parts in the specified order
5. In case the part has been damaged, try again if there is a repair kit and any more weapon parts.
6. All replaced parts are retained until the condition of the weapon is lowered. In this case, to improve the quality, the parts will need to be replaced anew.
7. When all five parts have been replaced, the quality of the weapon will be changed to the corresponding one. On that note, if at least one of the replaced items has been worn out, the quality of the weapon will be changed to "worn", even if other weapon parts are replaced with new ones.

The predetermined order of replacing weapon parts is due to the need to match the parts to the state of the weapon, since all replaced parts for each weapon that have ever been partially repaired in the vice are stored in the game memory. This allows you to continue repairs from the same location without having to re-replace parts, provided that the weapon condition has not been lowered after repair.
Weapon upgrade procedure is only available at a condition of 95�100% for weapons of rusty or worn quality:

1. Select a repair kit for the replacement of barrel or a weapon upgrade kit in the list by double clicking on the name of the set in the list. The replacement order is not available for upgrades.
2. Select a part corresponding to the repair kit in the list with a single mouse click. When upgrading, only working parts can be used.
3. Click on the image of the part that is being currently replaced
4. In case the replacement is successful, this procedure remains the same for all other weapon parts.
5. In case the part has been damaged, try again if there is a repair kit and any more weapon parts.
6. All replaced parts are retained until the state of the weapon is lowered. In this case, to improve the quality, the parts will require further replacements.
7. When all five parts have been replaced with new ones, the quality of the weapon will be changed to "new".

Military flasks are intended for storing small amounts of water. Prepared by medics and scientists. First, the water - combined with a special type of alcohol - is boiled at a very high temperature for purification and disinfection. Afterwards, it is cooled in refrigerators, to which it owes its refreshing "spark." The end result is water that is completely radiation-free. If in spite of the above, you still have doubts concerning its purity, you can always use akvatab. Due to the cost of production, military flasks are in a limited supply and are sold at a moderate price. Medics also have them in stock, but they're slightly more expensive as they include the cost of transportation.

Tushonka is a common name of canned, stewed meat produced in the Soviet Union and other Warsaw Pact countries. The irony is that the idea originally came to Russia in a form of World War II aid transports from the United States. Since then, various kinds of tushonkas have become a primary means of long-time meat preservation, used both by the civilian population and as a standard-issue Red Army food ration. Despite their long expiry date, tushonkas are known for their high nutrition value (mostly owing to high fat content) and a relatively good taste. The Chernobyl Exclusion Zone has seen hundreds of types and tastes of tushonkas. In the spring of 2013 'Abakan' minced-meat brand remains the unquestionable king, and certainly the Zone has seen worse than that.

The Meal, Ready-to-Eat (commonly known as the MRE) is a self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging, developed by the United States military for its service members for use in combat or other field conditions where organised food facilities are not available. One MRE can be used as one meal. The packaging of an MRE is designed to withstand rough conditions and exposure to the elements. Contains one course along with a variety of other food and drink items. While it can be eaten cold, it usually tastes much better when heated up with the included flameless ration heater (FRH, a water-activated exothermic reaction device that emits heat).

Breakfast, dinner and supper all in one package. Includes various food items whose function is to provide the body with all minerals and microelements essential for your health as well as cooking equipment (small metal frame, fuel tablets, matches, striker) and other items (e.g. napkins) facilitating use in field conditions. Comes with a polymeric box that protects the ingredients from hazardous environmental conditions. The polymeric box has 3 sections, each respectively for breakfast, dinner and supper.

"The Beak" is a powerful mixture of Zone-produced vodka and pulverised beak of a black crow. Not every beak can be used as an ingredient, because only black male crows that have lived in the Zone for more than 15 years have mutated sufficiently. The rumour has it that such beaks contain a form of enriched protein that cleanses moderate amounts of radiation from the body. Some even say that drinking "the Beak" makes you feel like you have wings for a few seconds. On the downside, however, the taste itself is awful.\n

Being caught by surprise in the Zone is one of the worst things that can happen to you. Although the QR-system does not help you prevent such situations, it certainly helps with getting out of danger. Its function is simple: it almost immediately removes the straps from your backpack and lets you escape to a safe place without the heavy backpack hampering your movement. To use it, set it as a hotkey item. Push the hotkey to activate the emergency release that instantly drops your backpack (and everything inside it) to the ground. Your equipped weapon(s), ammunition, armour and armour attachments as well as UPD remain in your possession, so you are ready to fight. You can retrieve your backpack afterwards.

Its features are simple, consisting of a strap which can be dropped along with the backpack at any moment, in order to run away quickly. Quite compact and capacious. Practically, it allows you to reset your backpack along with some content.

An extremely durable backpack with implemented GPS devices. Automatically synchronised with your PDA once dropped to generate a stash that is marked on your PDA. The backpack is made of strong and durable materials that will keep your equipment safe and dry regardless of environmental conditions. The camouflaged design assures that it doesn't stand out from the surroundings.

Unique, a device that absorbs electrical energy around itself and partially transforms it into the body, increasing endurance. Excess energy leads to the regeneration of damaged tissues. It mainly serves as an over voltage protection for limited short-circuit shock current, limiting the amount of electricity coming into contact with the body, by closing it to the ground. Represents a rather complex electronic circuit of valuable radio components, which greatly increases the electrical resistance of the body. As a result, the body falls under a lower voltage and is able to withstand discharges of electricity that previously led to death. Thus, it is vitally important to have a current-limiting microreactor when it is necessary to approach electric anomalies or other sources of electricity. Like any electronic object, it can be used as a repair material with appropriate tools and skills.
 
%c[d_red]

%c[d_red]WARNING:%c[ui_gray_2]
 
%c[default]It should be noted that such a module will not be able to work properly and provide sufficient protection if your suit does not meet the minimum protection requirements while in an abnormal field.

Instead of simply carrying a backpack secured by a pair of shoulder straps, one can attach it to the suit by means of aluminium frames, which optimises your carrying capabilities. These improved frames are made of aluminium which is the material of choice due to its light weight, and some external elements are made of plastic in order to attain desired flexibility while sprinting. The whole construction is equipped with a system of straps and webbing to provide a high degree of adjustability. This quality design allows the shoulder straps to be adjusted up or down so as to make wearing a backpack comfortable regardless of one's torso size. Single set of frames replaces only the main framework of your backpack, but it's possible to use more sets to further improve your carrying capabilities. Although the system is built of light aluminium, some parts can still prove useful for minor outfit repairs.
 

		%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

		%c[d_cyan] � %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable

The whole construction is equipped with a system of straps and webbing to provide a high degree of adjustability. This quality design allows the shoulder straps to be adjusted up or down so as to make wearing a backpack comfortable regardless of one's torso size. A single grid replaces only the main framework of your backpack, but it's possible to use more grids to further improve your carrying capabilities. The improved freon emission module is designed to maintain a constant temperature around the body at the level of 20 degrees Celsius. It is thus extremely useful in order to minimise the effects of extreme heat in situations requiring additional protection. It emits a thick layer of freon-cooled air particles which produce a miniscule vacuum absorbing any excess heat and slightly decreasing the temperature around the user. Another feature of the freon emission module is its ability to resist electricity to a moderate extent.

		%c[d_cyan] � %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable

The improved body cooler is an electric module designed to maintain a constant temperature around the body at the level of 14 degrees Celsius. It is thus extremely useful in order to minimise the effects of extreme heat in situations requiring additional protection. It emits quick electrical impulses which produce a miniscule vacuum absorbing any excess heat and slightly decreasing the temperature around the user. It does not require water to function. Another feature of the body cooler is its ability to resist electricity to a moderate extent. In case of disassembly of the unit using a toolkit, the metal casing can be reused as outfit repair material.

Kevlar plates are widely known for their protective capabilities, and are highly valued because of this feature. They perform a wide variety of functions, the most important of which is absorbing the impact of firearm projectiles on the front and the back of the torso. They constitute a lightweight alternative to heavy steel plates. Additionally, any type of armour plating also helps maintain suits in good condition, preventing degradation through wear and tear. Used by military units the world over.

These steel plates are specially crafted, heat treated and shaped for ballistic defeating properties, fitting a wide variety of protective applications. They are designed to withstand smaller ballistic impacts on the front and the back of the torso. This protection, however, comes at a price as the thick steel plates are very heavy, thus limiting freedom of movement. Additionally, any type of armour plating also helps maintain suits in good condition, preventing degradation through wear and tear. Used extensively by Spetsnaz forces.

Borrowing its name from the myth that camels store water in their humps, camelbak is a pack worn on the back or around the waist of the user, containing a bladder that is filled with water to keep one hydrated. Flexible tube with a mouthpiece facilitates use even in most pressing situations. This model is camouflaged and integrated in the suit to protect the system from damage from any source, be it combat or anomaly. Because the container is made of a high-quality textile, experienced stalkers sometimes re-use scrapped camelbaks for quality materials to patch their field outfits.
 
%c[d_red]

%c[d_red]WARNING:%c[ui_gray_2]
 
%c[default]Although water has low electrical conductivity, its proximity to the body may make you more vulnerable to electrical currents. For this reason, it is recommended to take special notice of your surroundings when in possession of a camelbak.

A small albeit advanced device that absorbs electrical energy from its closest surroundings. It serves as a protection of sorts as it limits the amount of electricity that comes into direct contact with the body by either blocking it or by shorting it to ground. As it is in fact a very sophisticated resistor circuit, the Surge Suppressor greatly increases electrical resistance of the body. The result is that the user is hit by a significantly lower voltage and is able to survive outbursts which would normally be lethal. It is thus of vital importance to have a surge suppressor on your belt when in proximity of electrical anomalies and other sources of electricity in the Zone. As with all metal objects, it can be used as a source of repair material as long as one has appropriate tools and enough skill.

The Improvised Application Module (IAM) filters a small amount of radiation particles emitted from artefacts. This mechanical metal pouch is the cheapest device that allows the user to harness the power of less potent artefacts. Artefact filter is composed of multiple layers made primarily of lead which shield from radiation. A low-cost alternative to the more reliable AAC and AAM. In case of emergency or if no longer needed, the module can be utilised as a source of quality metal for use in outfit or helmet repairs. Currently unusable. To attach it to the belt, you have to put an artefact inside. The artefact will retain its characteristics with the exception of reduced radiation output.

The Artefact Application Container (AAC) filters a moderate amount of radiation particles emitted from artefacts. This mechanical aluminium container is the most cost-efficient and thus the most popular way of handling artefacts as it allows the user to harness the power of more potent artefacts. Artefact filter is composed of multiple layers made primarily of lead, with one layer of thorium which has strong radiation shielding properties. This device has been manufactured by scientists residing in military bunkers around the Zone. In case of emergency or if no longer needed, the module can be utilised as a source of quality metal for use in outfit or helmet repairs. Currently unusable. To attach it to the belt, you have to put an artefact inside. The artefact will retain its characteristics with the exception of reduced radiation output.

This advanced mechanical module is the most effective way of harnessing the power of most potent artefacts. Artefact filter is composed of numerous layers made of nano-carbon. It is hence lightweight and has strongest radiation shielding properties of all devices. Regarded as a symbol of affluence in the Zone. Most commonly used by the scientists to minimise the harmful effects of artefacts. Designed and manufactured in Ukraine by a government institute which provides equipment for the scientists residing in the Zone of Alienation. In case of emergency or if no longer needed, the module can be utilised as a source of quality metal for use in outfit or helmet repairs. Currently unusable. A hide almost fully covered with a thick layer of fur, removed from one of wild boars found commonly in the Zone. The mutants themselves are quite resistant to damage and can take considerable punishment, and the reason for this is simple: big muscle mass and almost unbreakable bones. The skin, on the other hand, is quite thin (most probably to provide the creature with effective means of thermal regulation), making it a rather poor choice for armour enhancement. The fur in turn makes the hide a relatively potent thermal insulator. Can also be used for light repairs. Unfortunately, wearing the pelt on top of the armour makes the user less resistant to radioactive and toxic damage as heavy particles often accumulate within the fur.
 

		%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

		%c[d_cyan] � %c[ui_gray_2] light mutant pelt 

		%c[d_cyan] � %c[ui_gray_2] effectiveness of mult. units is stackable

Bloodsuckers as a species evolved from humans and this affinity can still be seen in the texture of their skin. What is most characteristic, the skin is very soft and pleasant in touch, almost like the skin of a child. This applies, however, only to the outer layer - underneath, bloodsuckers boast well-developed muscles which can be utilised to form a coat of sorts with considerable damage reducing potential, especially in regard to melee attacks. This makes bloodsucker skin a popular choice among experienced hunters who also wear it as a sign of their proficiency. The most unique property and at the same time the main drawback of the skin is its very intense reaction to temperature change - although the tissue itself will only burn in very high temperatures, it can get very hot making it increasingly damaging to wearer and equipment underneath it.
 

		%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:

What is most characteristic, the skin is very soft and pleasant in touch, almost like the skin of a child. This applies, however, only to the outer layer - underneath, Psysuckers boast well-developed muscles which can be utilised to form a coat of sorts with considerable damage reducing potential, especially in regard to melee attacks. This makes Psysucker skin a popular choice among experienced hunters who also wear it as a sign of their proficiency. The most unique property and at the same time the main drawback of the skin is its very intense reaction to temperature change - although the tissue itself will only burn in very high temperatures, it can get very hot making it increasingly damaging to wearer and equipment underneath it. Skinning a burer is a lot like skinning a twisted dwarf. Add to it an almost unbearable stench of bad eggs and you get the idea why stalkers consider this quite a feat. Reports indicate that whereas the skin offers relatively low physical protection it can be used to absorb and disperse significant amounts of incoming psy waves when worn over the head. Burer's skin has low electrical resistance, thus the wearer is more susceptible to electrical damage. Furthermore, due to the fact that burers are relatively rarely encountered in the Zone, the skin has significant research potential, making it a valuable trading commodity for the scientists.

Chimera, being one of the most dangerous mutants in the Zone, is not only a significant threat, but can also be regarded as a viable source of wealth. All parts that can be taken from chimera's corpse can be sold for a large amount of money, but it is the skin that is one of the most valued scientific specimens as well as one of the best armour enhancements available in the Exclusion Zone. It offers very good protection properties and, even more importantly, is relatively light-weight thanks to which it does not limit mobility. However, its most unique feature is that organic fibres found in the skin act as very effective electrical conductors. This fact to a large degree confirms reports of recon units (especially those scouting around the AMK Industrial Complex) concerning sightings of chimeras surrounded in what looked like an electrical anomaly, producing discharges on contact with any hostile living organism. Unfortunately, no unit was able to make it back, so there is no evidence confirming the existence of such a creature.

The skin of a pseudogiant in many ways resembles the skin of an elephant. It's thick and hard in touch, its texture is very irregular and full of folds which act as the creature's cooling mechanism. The average thickness of pseudogiant's skin is around 2 cm, which makes it very durable and capable of withstanding significant damage. This is, however, at the cost of increased weight. Since pseudogiants are known to often live in areas of high toxicity and radioactivity, the hide naturally adapted to such conditions, which further increases its usefulness. It can also be used to patch even the heaviest of outfits but this process requires the most durable and expensive tools available. It is valued not only for its practical qualities, but can also serve as a prestigious hunting trophy and a rare specimen for the scientists in the Zone.

As is the case with other humanoid mutants, it's quite an emotional challenge to scalp a controller and it proves to be even more difficult as the face of a controller retains certain characteristics of the person it once was. Confidential sources within the military also revealed that fingerprints of the person who turned into a controller can sometimes be found in the database. Recent analysis shows that not only the hand of the controller is capable of producing psy waves - the whole body is the source of emissions. For this reason, the scalp - when prepared properly - has the ability to absorb and filter psy energy, but for this effect to take place it is necessary to cover your head with multiple scalps. The skin is also electrically conductive. As regards its physical properties, it is light and can only be used for minor outfit repairs. As is the case with all humanoid psy creatures, the skin of a controller is electrically conductive.

Densely covered with short and stiff fur, the pelt of pseudodog remains one of the most useful, widespread and versatile mutant pelts available in the Zone. It can be easily attached to armour with even lightest of tools, and yet it's quite durable, which makes it suitable for medium-grade outfit repairs. When used as a whole - it can cover significant area of the body with protective layer which increases resistance to both physical damage and heat. The fur also provides effective insulation. However, as is the case with all such pelts, it easily catches radioactive and toxic particles, so it is highly advised to remove it when in radioactive or toxic areas.

The fur of a psy dog is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful and rare clothing materials in the world. Usually snow white or grey, it is in great demand and can be sold for a hefty sum of money. It's probably made its way into fashion industry thanks to smugglers some of whom have recently turned to hunting mutants. For those in the Zone, it can serve as a blanket, especially during cold nights, and offers efficient rupture protection and mild psy influence reduction when head part of the fur is used as a mask or a hood. However, it easily catches radioactive and toxic particles, so it is highly advised to remove it when in radioactive or toxic areas. Hunters wear it with pride, but only if the creature was slain by their own hands.

This artefact resembles melted cheese interspersed with sapphire-like stones. Only yellow outer shell of the artefact appears to give off radiation and by careful processing it is possible to extract the non-radioactive blue parts for jewellery and other industrial purposes. This is due to the fact that if cleaned properly and polished, sapphire comparison becomes much more explicit: the stones are as hard and durable as this beautiful gem. This quality of theirs and their appearance make them perfect gemstones and jewellers all over the world strive to have them in stock. 
		
The usefulness of the artefact, however, is not limited to its industrial applications. There is scientific evidence suggesting that sapphire-like stones effectively protect from psy-waves, whereas the outer shell slightly increases resistance to toxicity.
		
However, it can cause objects in its vicinity to heat up and in extreme cases to ignite along with the artefact. For this reason, it is safe to conclude that it absorbs heat and is able to convey it to other objects.
		
Due to its density the weight of artefact has increased beyond normal standards, and thus it is one of the heaviest anomalous creations in the Zone.

This unique electrostatic artefact can resonate under the influence of psy-waves. Stalkers have learned to fine-tune the artefact so that it resonates in opposite phase to the main source of emissions, thus significantly neutralizing their effects. This orb of considerable beauty also increases electrical protection by reducing conductivity in the body when exposed to high levels of electricity.
		
It should be noted that Moonlight will catch fire when exposed to open flame or even spontaneously combust. 
		
 
Radiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Black Spray shares a similar shape to other sapphire-like artefacts. However, the organic nature of the stem (which shares similar properties to Pin artefacts) suggests that its formed from vascular plants under exposure to dangerous psy-fields and electromagnetic waves.
		
Another unique property is the ability to delay the transmission of light that enters it. The said mysterious mechanism is applied to psy-waves surrounding the artefact as well. For this particular reason, Black Spray significantly neutralises psy interferences in a large radius.
		
These beneficial properties, however, come at a price. This artefact is extremely dangerous when exposed in toxic environments as it amplifies their effect and increases their potency. When exploring toxic areas, it is hence highly recommended to keep the artefact in your backpack.

Two disks of organic formation (commonly lipids, cellulose and lignin) with nothing but empty space in between. This is due to a unique gravitation field formed in the centre that stabilise the distance between the disks.
		
Any attempt to press the disks together, or pull them apart will fail due to rapid positive/negative changes in the gravitational field. As if the artefact reacts to any physical power that breaks its balance.
		
Because of this mechanism, moving with an Empty is a hard task. As the gravitational field increases the density of surrounding air and slows the body down.
		
The real usefulness of this effect comes to the ability to reduce friction, thus obtaining great protection against physical impacts.

Due to its beautiful inner core it is highly sought after by jewellers all over the world, however it is best to proceed with caution as unskilled treatment can cause the artefact to explode with power sufficient to level a small building. Gravi is formed from metallic substances exposed to prolonged gravitation. This makes it capable of sustaining an powerful anti-gravitational field, which causes it to have various properties, among others reducing weight of all objects in its close proximity. A dangerous effect of this artefact is the fact that it will increase electrical conductivity, so the probability of electrocution while wearing this artefact is much higher, especially during storms and in the vicinity of electrical anomalies.
		
Another downside is that it will increase the negative effects of psy-waves and is a potent conductor.

Thanks to meticulous research that followed, it was established that this new artefact is produced when three Gravi artefacts interact and get sucked into one another's singularity fields. This phenomenon is extremely rare, due to which the artefact is highly valued.
		
It is rumoured within Ukrainian Spetsnaz circles that in the Zone there are agents from the Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation whose sole objective is acquiring and transporting Goldfish to specialised laboratories located outside of the Zone.
		
The artefact creates a constant anti-gravitational singularity field which affects only its closest vicinity. However, some stalkers have been known to disappear for no apparent reason leaving only a Goldfish behind.
		
Big downside, however, comes along with this powerful anti-gravitational field: the velocity of moving objects inside its radius will rapidly increase, causing dangerous impacts on surrounding objects, including the holder.

Also colloquially known as "Radioactive Snowflake". At first glance, this artefact resembles a white Kolobok.
		
Thanks to its unique properties, the artefact can significantly increase the bearer's muscle tone, thus greatly improving stamina recovery. Due to its high radioactivity, stalkers in possession of it are sometimes jokingly referred to as "Radioactive Snowflakes".
		
When faced with the decision whether to carry it on the belt during a mission, you have to carefully weigh its pros and cons: does it pay to have greater endurance and high protection against electricity at the cost of being constantly exposed to its deadly radiation? Even if you are determined to take it with you, it should be noted that it is not to be used on long excursions to the Zone.
		
Snowflake, however, holds a big downside: it interacts with surrounding energy sources by absorbing and amplifying their effects. For this reason, approaching heat sources, toxic areas and psy-fields while holding this artefact is a suicide.
		
It is as light as a snowflake and very easy to carry around.

"Big, red and cursed."
		\nThis is how the locals prefer to describe the Death Lamp, while some refer to it as the "Seed of Satan". Many traders believe the rumours surrounding the artefact, thus refusing to buy it.
		Little is known about its origins, and nothing of value has been discovered so far.
		\nDeath Lamp was first discovered few years ago by a group of three experienced stalkers. Shortly after delivering the artefact to the Ecologists in Yantar, two of them found dead with a horrific expression on their faces. Nothing is known about the fate of the third stalker.
		\nFollowing the accident, members of the science team who studied the artefact had reported having nightmare disorder in the days to follow.

Gravi is formed from metallic substances exposed to prolonged gravitation. This makes it capable of sustaining an powerful anti-gravitational field, which causes it to have various properties, among others reducing weight of all objects in its close proximity. For a long time, the artefact was a mystery, and it was scientist Sakharov at Yantar who first discovered that Gravi creates a minute singularity field of anti-gravitational nature, the phenomenon which occurs in intervals of 30 minutes.
		
A dangerous effect of this artefact is the fact that it will increase electrical conductivity, so the probability of electrocution while wearing this artefact is much higher, especially during storms and in the vicinity of electrical anomalies.
		
Another downside is that it will increase the negative effects of psy-waves and is a potent conductor.
		
 
Radiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Direct successor to and a superior version of Gravi artefact. As was the case with Gravi, it was scientist Sakharov at Yantar who discovered its unique properties after a massive blowout/emission hit the Zone.
		
Thanks to meticulous research that followed, it was established that this new artefact is produced when three Gravi artefacts interact and get sucked into one another's singularity fields. This phenomenon is extremely rare, due to which the artefact is highly valued.
		
It is rumoured within Ukrainian Spetsnaz circles that in the Zone there are agents from the Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation whose sole objective is acquiring and transporting Goldfish to specialised laboratories located outside of the Zone.
		
The artefact creates a constant anti-gravitational singularity field which affects only its closest vicinity. However, some stalkers have been known to disappear for no apparent reason leaving only a Goldfish behind.
		
Big downside, however, comes along with this powerful anti-gravitational field: the velocity of moving objects inside its radius will rapidly increase, causing dangerous impacts on surrounding objects, including the holder.
		
 
Radiation output is highest on the artefact radiation scale.

Shaped like a DNA helix, Mama's Beads are created in the Burner anomaly. One of their most characteristic features is that they constantly pulsate, generating emissions beneficial to the human body. These emissions increase the metabolism of any living creature, accelerating coagulation and healing of wounds.The mechanism behind the effects of this artefact is still unknown.
		
Mama's Beads also possess potent protective qualities: they are able to shield the body and objects from extreme heat.
		
On the other hand, it should be noted that the presence of this artefact increases electrical conductivity, so the probability of electrocution while wearing this artefact is much higher, especially during storms and in the vicinity of electrical anomalies.
		
The weight is also quite high for such a small artefact, which leads to a conclusion that is of high density.
		
 
Radiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.

This artefact, which resembles the human eye, considerably increases metabolism of the body, helping wounds heal quicker. Experienced stalkers say that Eye also brings luck. Irrespective of the validity of that statement, its positive effects are indeed quite potent. 
		
This artefact soothes the pain and is extremely useful when treating wounds.
		
When worn, it is known to slightly counter harmful effects of psy-anomalies or psy-waves of certain mutants.
		
These beneficial qualities, however, come at a price. This artefact is extremely dangerous when exposed to chemical anomalies as it amplifies their toxicity and increases their potency. It is hence highly recommended to keep the artefact in your backpack, never on the body, when exploring toxic areas unless you have a death wish.
		
The artefact is also known colloquially as "copper eye" as it conducts electricity and amplifies its dangerous effects in the same way as copper does. 
		
 
Radiation output is average on the artefact radiation scale.

Its healing capabilities are even stronger than in case of the Eye as stalkers in possession of this artefact are said to have survived being wounded by chimeras. Thanks to that, it has earned the reputation of a miraculous artefact.
		
Many stalkers owe it their lives, and most veteran mutant hunters carry it in case they run into danger. However, it shares not only positive but also negative properties of its cousin: entering a psy-field with this artefact on the belt is suicide. Also, it is highly advised to proceed with caution when planning to bring the artefact to the market as prolonged exposure to even minimal amounts of radioactive materials can result in death of the user.
		
It can also be used as a reusable medkit of sorts since it heals wounds very quickly.
		
 
Radiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

Shell is composed of two disk of bluish colour connected by semitransparent material of unknown nature.
		
This strange artefact was considered devoid of any useful properties by many scientists for a long time. Only recently has it been discovered that it is indeed quite beneficial.
		
When the artefact comes into contact with the body, it will make one feel rejuvenated and thus it increases stamina recovery. This effect has in case of some stalkers induced hyperactivity. One downside of this artefact, however, is that it reduces the number of platelets in blood, thus increasing bleeding rate.
		
It provides a considerable level of psy protection and absorbs electromagnetic interference, acting as a grounding material.

Shell is extremely light and very portable.

Also colloquially known as "Radioactive Snowflake". At first glance, this artefact resembles a white Kolobok.
		
Thanks to its unique properties, the artefact can significantly increase the bearer's muscle tone, thus greatly improving stamina recovery. Due to its high radioactivity, stalkers in possession of it are sometimes jokingly referred to as "Radioactive Snowflakes".
		
When faced with the decision whether to carry it on the belt during a mission, you have to carefully weigh its pros and cons: does it pay to have greater endurance and high protection against electricity at the cost of being constantly exposed to its deadly radiation? Even if you are determined to take it with you, it should be noted that it is not to be used on long excursions to the Zone.
		
Snowflake, however, holds a big downside: it interacts with surrounding energy sources by absorbing and amplifying their effects. For this reason, approaching heat sources, toxic areas and psy-fields while holding this artefact is a suicide.
		
It is as light as a snowflake and very easy to carry around.
		
 
Radiation output is high on the artefact radiation scale.

A prototype of the next generation of GPS navigation devices. Only few copies are made. Distributed among the highest military ranks exclusively, although some of these have been leaked out to other sides. The improved module guarantees operation even in hostile environments. High sensitivity during acquisition or while tracking allows for use in many different environments and under toughest operating conditions. Unlike usual GPS modules, this one relies on sets of codes that allows the module to acquire special privileges on the connected channel. It retrieves the position of other connected modules in a radius of 300 meters. On the other hand, this module consumes a considerable amount of electrical power while operating. An automatic switching circuit is included inside the module to turn it off after 20 seconds of continuous scanning.
 

		%c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:

		%c[d_blue] � %c[ui_gray_2] technological item

		%c[d_blue] � %c[ui_gray_2] very high electric power consumption

An advanced pulse-Doppler weather radar mini-kit. This kit considered as a miracle in meteorology field. It sends directional pulses of microwave radiation, on the order of a microsecond long, using a cavity magnetron connected by a waveguide to a parabolic antenna to collect weather data.

		Two scientists found out that using Meatchunk artefact near the antenna can greatly amplify the pulse power, to the point it alters the ions in the Troposphere layer of the atmoshphere and completely change its properties.

A simple set of sticks of pine wood impregnated with resin. Anyone who has ever tried to light a fire in the open air knows that random gusts of wind can extinguish the flames very quickly. The firestarter set allows you to create a small but steady hearth fire, the temperature of which is significantly higher than that of paper or wax. An indispensable thing in any campaign, because it easy to light up even in the wet.



		%c[d_green] � %c[ui_gray_2] is used for starting fires

This compact foldable oven is intended for cooking single entree meals with dry wood. However, since wood found within the Zone is far too contaminated to be used for that purpose, stalkers rely on imported charcoal as the cheapest and most widely available burnable material. The stove can produce temperatures sufficient to grill less poisoned mutant meat, but preparing more toxic meat requires the utilisation of more advanced equipment. Basic fire skills are needed. Made of stainless steel and ultralight titanium.
 

		%c[ui_gray_3]NOTES:
 

		%c[ui_gray_1]Although charcoal is available in the Zone at relatively cheap prices, you need to use a significant amount of it in order to prepare a single meal. For this reason, charcoal is not as cost effective as it would seem. On the other hand, it is relatively light, which makes it perfect for longer trips deep in the Zone.
 

		%c[ui_gray_1]Mutant meats that do not require high temperature to be prepared are referred to as 'low-tier', whereas those that require high temperature - 'high-tier'.

This army kettle features a convex-concave bottom profile, concave on one side. It is supplied with a wire handle-loop for hanging and carrying. When worn on the waist belt, the concave side should be placed to the body. The bowl cover can be used as a pan when heating or preparing a second dish. The handle of the lid is designed to hold it, securely closing the lid when carrying, and a tablespoon is inserted into the special holes on the handle.
 

		%c[ui_gray_3]NOTES:
 

		%c[ui_gray_1]Since fuels used in the multi-fuel stove are much more efficient energy-carriers than the wood or coal, the multi-fuel stove is - in the long run - significantly more cost-effective than traditional wood or coal stoves. A box of matches is the second most important item in the Zone after a weapon. With the help of matches, a fire can be created, a light can be passed to a friend, and small spaces can be illuminated. This particular box was produced in an unknown underground factory in the roundabouts of the Zone, therefore high quality is not to be expected, though the price is not high, either. The box has been permanently crumpled, crumbling sulphur and broken wet matches. Only a quarter of its contents remains usable. Even so, lighting a fire or a cigarette is very difficult if using the matchbox - thus, stalkers tend to purchase a more expensive but practical lighter.

A formation of thermal nature. The Itcher consists of two separated layers. The surface is a hard, dense metamorphic rock with deep scars covering the entire body. Completely inactive and doesn't hold any noticeable properties. On the other hand, the soft, yellow glowing core is from unknown organic nature. It actively consumes excessive heat and remains cool at all times.
		
However, it is not recommended to approach chemical and acid anomalies when in possession of the artefact as it will increase the adverse effects of acids and toxins in user's bloodstream.

A small artefact formed by thermal anomalies in the Zone under extreme temperatures. The look of this artefact suggests that it was an organ of a vascular plant. Further studies showed that other organic tissues are fused deep inside.
		
The stem doesn't hold any useful properties. On the contrary, the small pins reduce temperature of user's body and cool all objects in their vicinity.
		
This artefact offers a slight psy-protection as it will resonate under the influence of psy-waves. On the other hand, it is not recommended to approach chemical and acid anomalies when in possession of the artefact as it will increase the adverse effects of acids and toxins in user's bloodstream.

Thanks to meticulous research that followed, it was established that this new artefact is produced when three Gravi artefacts interact and get sucked into one another's singularity fields. This phenomenon is extremely rare, due to which the artefact is highly valued.
		
It is rumoured within Ukrainian Spetsnaz circles that in the Zone there are agents from the Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation whose sole objective is acquiring and transporting Goldfish to specialised laboratories located outside of the Zone.

Shaped like a DNA helix, Mama's Beads are created in the Burner anomaly. One of their most characteristic features is that they constantly pulsate, generating emissions beneficial to the human body. These emissions increase the metabolism of any living creature, accelerating coagulation and healing of wounds.The mechanism behind the effects of this artefact is still unknown.
		
Mama's Beads also possess potent protective qualities: they are able to shield the body and objects from extreme heat.
		
On the other hand, it should be noted that the presence of this artefact increases electrical conductivity, so the probability of electrocution while wearing this artefact is much higher, especially during storms and in the vicinity of electrical anomalies.
		
The weight is also quite high for such a small artefact, which leads to a conclusion that is of high density.
		
 
Radiation output is low on the artefact radiation scale.
